===== Built using CodeRush 11.2 =====
=== Introduction ===
A ToolWindow to translate the active member to another language.

=== Usage ===
Bring up the !ToolWindow using !DevExpress\!ToolWindows\Translator

Place the caret within some code. 

the !ToolWindow will translate the active member to the language specified within the !ToolWindow.
